prompt_base: overweight middle-aged man, yellow humanoid skin, almost completely bald head, five o'clock shadow, 8k realistic photo, studio lighting
feature_prompt: visible pores on face, stubble and skin imperfections, detailed collar fabric on white shirt, detailed neck fat texture, subtle sweat
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, perfect skin, clean shaven, flat lighting, low quality, messy clothing, handsome, muscular
